items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: I love these sweaters. I ordered the red one and the navy one. They are very soft and so comfortable to wear and warm during this cold weather we are having. I will say that they run a bit small but I am so thin at 5'8" and 118lbs that they are fine for me with my regular size which is small. If you have a fuller figure you might want to size up. They do stretch but that won't cover any tummy rolls as they fit closely to the body. The colors are beautiful and since I'm a UGA DAWG the red goes very well with my black jeans. (Even though we didn't make the NCAA National Championship playoffs this year I'm still so proud of my DAWGS). However they will be perfect with any type pants you choose to wear. I will not put them in the washer but will hand wash and lay them on a towel to dry. I think it says you can put them in the washer but I don't do that with any of my sweaters. They both seem to be well made and I've had no trouble with them. I will also say that I have a long neck so I have no trouble with the cowl neck but they might not work as well on a person with a very short neck. They can be rolled down a bit or spread out on the shoulders but I haven't tried that and don't know if the neck would stay in place that way. The best way is the way the model in the picture has the neck fixed. I would recommend these sweaters to anyone who wears sweaters with turtle or cowl necks. They are comfortable, lovely and warm. Enjoy! Actually the color I ordered was wine and it's a beautiful dark red. Read more
items.author: Candace R. Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove, perfect amount of stretch, wardrobe staple
items.body: Excellent quality, perfect fit, just the right weight (not bulky), gorgeous color, very comfortable and warm. bought this in the red and white. I will be wearing these all fall and winter long. Order your size if you wanted it to fit like the model. Size up if you prefer a loose fit. The fabric is ribbed and stretchy. For reference, I am 5 foot eight, 168 pounds, and I bought a size medium in the red and large in the white. Fits me perfectly. Read more
items.author: samkork

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful top
items.body: Love this top in the light brown color. It is heavy fabric, stretchy but fits nicely your body shape. It is soft and keeps you warm on cold days. I like the turtleneck that is loose and falls around your neck Read more
items.author: Anna M Dolgin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice find
items.body: $30 in my opinion is a lot to pay for a sweater. I know that some people consider it inexpensive but I am the type of person that will wait for a sweater I really want to get down to $15 or less and I thrift. However, my time to go out shopping for clothing is limited and It has become difficult to find ribbed fitted cowl neck sweaters, which for years has been a staple in my fall and winter wardrobe. I am 145 lbs, 5 foot 5 and typically wear 8 or 10 in women’s clothing. I ordered medium and the fit is great. I took off a star because I consider this to be expensive for a thin sweater, but what can you get these days for that price? Ordered the khaki and since I consider Amazon clothes to factor in the cost of convenience, I also ordered the brown. If the brown is good, I plan to order the ivory and black. Then I should be set on enjoy a neutral wardrobe for the next few years, hopefully they will last. I like fitted sweaters to wear with high waist skirts and jeans. I hate frumpy styles. These sweaters I think are sexy while also being classy. Read more
items.author: whistleinmyboots

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shirt
items.body: Great material. It's form fitting but not skin tight. The light green is beautiful and looks like the picture. I got a small and I'm 125-130. Read more
items.author: dawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Fit & Luxurios Feel
items.body: I Love this White Ridged Cowl Sweater! I am 5'7" & Size 14 slacks! ___16 years ago bought 4 - V Neck Ridged Sweaters from JCP. They have held up well to washing though I hand dry most of time! The White ones are my Favories I wear'All the Time'!!! ___ In the 1980s I wore Cowl Necks! In the Ad Description this Sweater is a Slim Fit! I Hesitated to purchase 2 years ago! ____Very pleasently suprized to try it on and the Large fit perfectly Clinging & made my Bust look amazing in my new padded Bra! I always wear jackets! (I may have been able to wear the 1st sweater backwards, may have been a return -no paper tag!) ____ i have loose skin in midrift due to weight loss! It will show in this sweater! ____The sweater didn't have a Sales tag therefore I put it on backwards! "Sensational!" ____The 2nd sweater, I tried on the proper way & noticed special detail ridge angling from arm bust area knto tummy area! Not a seam! Not noticeable! ___I plan on wearing my 'Beautiful Elegant Feeling Cowel' Sweater Backwards! Sorry! (Not taking a chance! It took me 33 years for this style sweater to come back in style!!! Great price too! ___The sweater has elasticity slimming arms & proper sleeve length & body length! ____Love the 'Cowel Neckline' wbich is much larger than appears in photo! We can adjust height perfectly! It too has an elegant look! ___There are 2 ways of wearing a Cowel Neckline! ___1) Creating 1 ridge which is very 1960s, by 1st folding Cowel once a little, then with 2 fingers on each side fold again & shaking in place! ___ 2) Follow #1 then pull up the Centsr closest to skin of neck a touch which creatss a 'Well' affect! Take Care, Skyblue7 Read more
items.author: Skyblue

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is Not a "COWL" Neck!
items.body: It is Not a cowl neck as the photo indicates. It is a standard Turtle neck. Very Nice quality, but not what I wanted! I specifically wanted a COWL neck. It keeps it away from your face, and make up rubbing off on it. The sizing is off IMO. I am a 5'9" 165 1lbs and a 36 C. I ordered a Large, which on their size chart indicates a 12-14 which is my correct size. It is quite Snug around the under Arm holes. I have several other shirts in this fabric and fit. So it is not the "type". It fits but would have preferred it a bit roomier. I will keep it, but would not order again. Read more
items.author: Hremo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and great fit!
items.body: So pleased with this! Just arrived, such a cute fit, warm and a great fit! Read more
items.author: narfgrr

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cowlnecknude, Cowlneck Green, Cowlneck Lightpurple, Cowlneck Babyblue, Cowlneck Softgrass, Coffee, Cowlneck Purple2, Cowlneckkhaki, Cowlneck Brown, Orange, 1cowlneckwine, Cowlneck Blue Haze, Cowlneckivory, Cowlneck Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
